actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title V of the Social Securtiy Act to increase the authorization of appropriations for the maternal and child health services block grant and to promote integrated physical and specialized mental health services for children and adolescents.
subjects: Federal aid to child health services
Federal aid to maternal health services

summary.text: Amends title V (Maternal and Child Health Services) of the Social Security Act (SSA) to increase the authorization of appropriations for the SSA title V program and to provide for the promotion of integrated physical and specialized mental health services.

titles.title: A bill to amend title V of the Social Securtiy Act to increase the authorization of appropriations for the maternal and child health services block grant and to promote integrated physical and specialized mental health services for children and adolescents.
